analysis-system-env-nightlies Environment Lock Files

To install environments from these lock files either download them from this page or direct your installer towards their url.

Report issues on GitHub: github.com/iris-hep/analysis-system-env-nightlies

Usage Examples

Python 3.11 pip example:

python -m pip install --upgrade --require-hashes --requirement https://iris-hep.org/analysis-system-env-nightlies/scikit-hep/3.11/requirements.lock

Python 3.11 conda-lock example:

micromamba create --name scikit-hep --file https://iris-hep.org/analysis-system-env-nightlies/scikit-hep/3.11/conda-lock.yml

or

# conda-lock install doesn't work with urls
curl -sLO https://iris-hep.org/analysis-system-env-nightlies/scikit-hep/3.11/conda-lock.yml
conda-lock install --name scikit-hep conda-lock.yml

scikit-hep

  • Python 3.11
    • requirements.txt (high level)
    • requirements.lock
    • environment.yml (high level)
    • conda-lock.yml
  • Python 3.8
    • requirements.txt (high level)
    • requirements.lock
    • environment.yml (high level)
    • conda-lock.yml

iris-hep

  • Python 3.11
    • requirements.txt (high level)
    • requirements.lock
    • environment.yml (high level)
    • conda-lock.yml
  • Python 3.8
    • requirements.txt (high level)
    • requirements.lock
    • environment.yml (high level)
    • conda-lock.yml
